SELECT mb.board_no as boardNo, mb.board_title as boardTitle, m.member_nick_name as boardUser, mb.board_date as boardDate, mb.board_category as boardCategory FROM member_board mb INNER JOIN member m ON mb.board_user=m.member_email
WHERE board_category='자유 게시판'
WHERE board_category='토론 게시판'
WHERE board_category NOT IN ('자유 게시판','토론 게시판')
ORDER BY mb.board_date DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT mb.board_no as boardNo, mb.board_title as boardTitle, mb.board_content as boardContent, mb.board_date as boardDate, m.member_nick_name as boardUser, mb.board_category as boardCategory FROM member_board mb INNER JOIN member m ON mb.board_user=m.member_email WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT comment_content as commentContent, comment_user as commentUser, comment_date as commentDate, comment_no as commentNo FROM member_board_comment WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT notice_no as noticeNo, notice_category as noticeCategory, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_date as noticeDate FROM notice ORDER BY notice_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice as notice, notice_category as noticeCategory, notice_date as noticeDate FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
